snippet: The Tour de France runner-up, Christopher Froome, took the overall lead in the Tour of Oman after finishing second in the fourth stage.
abstract: Tour de France runner-up Christopher Froome takes overall lead in cycling's Tour of Oman after finishing second in fourth stage.
lead_paragraph: The Tour de France runner-up, Christopher Froome, took the overall lead in the Tour of Oman after finishing second in the fourth stage.

headline.seo: Cyclist Christopher Froome Takes Lead in Tour of Oman
headline.main: Froome Takes Lead in Tour of Oman
